definition: vast, with no clear boundary/fig. hazy/indistinct/unclear/confused

sentences.english: All is Vastness even though there is no measure to it.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些都是苍茫即使没有它的措施。

sentences.english: The huts darkled away into the gloom of the field.
sentences.chinese: 那些茅舍逐渐变模糊，融入了一片苍茫的原野中。

sentences.english: They look like the sunset as vast and far-reaching, let me feel heavy.
sentences.chinese: 他们的眼神像落日一样苍茫而深远，让我觉得沉重。

sentences.english: The light of the setting sun suffused the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 落日余晖离开了峰顶，谷内暮色苍茫。

sentences.english: In the boundless twilight, this herd of beautiful creatures are silhouetted by the rays of evening sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 暮色苍茫中，这一群美生灵被霞光勾勒出一片剪影。

sentences.english: We listened to a rich voice which rolled out into the dusk.
sentences.chinese: 我们静听暮色苍茫中响起的一个圆润洪亮的声音。

sentences.english: There is a tide of Us in the Vastness of Stillness or the Stillness of Vastness.
sentences.chinese: 有一种潮流，我们在苍茫的广阔无垠的寂静或静止。

sentences.english: Lianyun vast sea air moving upstream were not sentient rock.
sentences.chinese: 苍茫海气连云动，石上游人别有情。

sentences.english: Velvet black shadows emphasize their brilliance, while the depths of the canyon are flooded by an ocean of vermilion dusk.
sentences.chinese: 而大峡谷的深处正沐浴在一派朱红的暮色苍茫中。

sentences.english: The tremendous spaciousness of it was glowing with rich gold .
sentences.chinese: 苍茫辽阔的景色染上了一片瑰丽浓艳的金黄色。

sentences.english: Lo the evening has come down upon the shore and in the fading light the seabirds come flying to their nests.
sentences.chinese: 看吧，暮色已经笼罩海岸，苍茫里海鸟已群飞归巢。

sentences.english: Sanguineous sky is the first paint of my series about archaian war field.
sentences.chinese: 血色苍茫是古战场系列画作的首篇。

sentences.english: The vast holiday, with no longer waiting.
sentences.chinese: 苍茫的假期，终不复等待。

sentences.english: However, on a cloudy day, looking around, one can only see boundless land disappearing into a sea of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 但遇阴天时，环顾四周，苍茫大地，尽入云海。

sentences.english: Sallow and emaciated, firm flower plait, but is very confused, the facial expression be diffused.
sentences.chinese: 面黄肌瘦，扎着花辫，却甚是零乱，表情苍茫。

sentences.english: The light is grey upon the lonely meadows, and the villagers are waiting for the ferry at the bank.
sentences.chinese: 孤寂的草地上日色苍茫，村民们在岸边等候着渡船。

definition: distantly remote/also written 邈遠|邈远[miao3 yuan3]
